content: empty granny square introduction thank you for selecting my granny square pattern - the perfect addition to the flower collection i hope that working on the granny square brings you a lot of joy i tried making all of the instructions clear and understandable but in case of any doubts feel free to dm me have fun and of course check out my other products at madebylisek etsy com you can also follow my instagram @madeby__lisek to get all the latest updates and behind-the- scenes photos materials time 15 min this tutorial difficulty 1/5 yarn / rope crochet hook scissors us terms suggestions of colors and hook sizes description of yarn fibre 85% cotton | 15% polyester thickness worsted/aran yardage/meterage 246 yds | 225m grams 250g final size material yarnart macrame width 15 cm / 5 9 in cotton 788 - 2mm height 15 cm / 5 9 in hook 3 5 mm about me hi i m anna and crocheting has been my hobby for the last 3 years this year my friends have finally convinced me to try and open a shop i m very excited about the new possibilities as crocheting is the complete opposite of my day-to-day job 2 granny square symbols abbreviations chain - chain half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet ij - invisible join* slip_stitch - slip_stitch tc - treble_crochet increase - increase with double_crochet 2 single_crochet - single_crochet mc - magic_ring blo - back loop only* double_crochet - double_crochet fptc - front-post treble_crochet *described on the last page graph written pattern round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet x9 slip_stitch blo total 10 round 2 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet in the same stitch increase x 9 slip_stitch blo total 20 round 3 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet in the same stitch double_crochet 1 increase x 9 double_crochet 1 slip_stitch blo total 30 round 4 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet in the same stitch double_crochet 2 increase x 9 double_crochet 2 slip_stitch blo total 40 round 5 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 3 tc chain 3 double_crochet 2 x 3 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 chain 3 tc chain 3 double_crochet slip_stitch blo total 40 chains not included round 6 single_crochet chain as first double_crochet double_crochet 6 double_crochet 3 in the chain space chain 2 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 3 in the chain space double_crochet 9 double_crochet 3 in the chain space chain 2 x 3 double_crochet 3 in the chain space double_crochet 2 ij total 64 chains not included 3 blo/tlo/flo wrong side right side tlo - third blo - back loop only loop only flo - front loop only invisible join 1 cut the yarn and pull the loop to make one string pull the cut yarn through the loop and insert the hook in the first loop of this round 2 pull the yarn to the other side 3 insert the hook into the last chain
